title: Crime against persons
desc:
Crime against persons: Population per crime against persons

Source: Table A2 in Guerry (1833). Compte général, 1825-1830

title: Crime against property
desc:
Crime against property: Population per crime against property

Source: Compte général, 1825-1830

title: Literacy
desc:
Percent Read & Write: Percent of military conscripts who can read and write

Source: Table A2 in Guerry (1833)

title: Donations to the poor
desc:
Donations to the poor

Source: Table A2 in Guerry (1833). Bulletin des lois

title: Illegitimate births
desc:
Population per illegitimate birth

Source: Table A2 in Guerry (1833). Bureau des Longitudes, 1817-1821

title: Suicides
desc:
Population per suicide

Source: Table A2 in Guerry (1833). Compte général, 1827-1830

title: Tax / capita
desc:
Per capita tax on personal property: A ranked index based on taxes on personal and movable property per inhabitant

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833)

title: Commerce & Industry
desc:
Commerce & Industry: Commerce and Industry, measured by the rank of the number of patents / population

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833)

title: Clergy
desc:
Distribution of clergy: Distribution of clergy, measured by the rank of the number of Catholic priests in active service / population

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833). Almanach officiel du clergy, 1829

title: Crime against parents
desc:
Crime against parents: Crimes against parents, measured by the rank of the ratio of crimes against parents to all crimes – Average for the years 1825-1830

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833). Compte général

title: Infanticides
desc:
Infanticides per capita: Ranked ratio of number of infanticides to population – Average for the years 1825-1830

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833). Compte général

title: Donations to the clergy
desc:
Donations to the clergy: Ranked ratios of the number of bequests and donations inter vivios to population – Average for the years 1815-1824

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833). Bull. des lois, ordunn. d’autorisation

title: Wager on Royal Lottery
desc:
Per capita wager on Royal Lottery: Ranked ratio of the proceeds bet on the royal lottery to population – Average for the years 1822-1826

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833). Compte rendu par le ministre des finances

title: Military desertion
desc:
Military desertion: Military disertion, ratio of the number of young soldiers accused of desertion to the force of the military contingent, minus the deficit produced by the insufficiency of available billets-- Average of the years 1825-1827

Source: Table A1 in Guerry (1833). Compte du ministère du guerre, 1829 état V

title: Instruction
desc: Instruction: Ranks recorded from Guerry's map of Instruction. Note: this is inversely related to literacy (as defined here)

title: Prostitutes
desc:
Prostitutes in Paris: Number of prostitutes registered in Paris from 1816 to 1834, classified by the department of their birth

Source: Parent-Duchatelet (1836),De la prostitution en Paris

title: Distance to paris
desc:
Distance to Paris (km): Distance of each department centroid to the centroid of the Seine (Paris)

Source: Calculated from department centroids

title: Population
desc:
Population in 1831, in 1000s

Source: Taken from Angeville (1836), Essai sur la Statistique de la Population français
